title: ADVISORY-India markets closed on Tuesday for holiday
text:
ADVISORY-India markets closed on Tuesday for holiday

Forex 47 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 07:00)

© Reuters. ADVISORY-India markets closed on Tuesday for holiday Oct 8 (Reuters) - India's currency, debt and equity markets are closed on Tuesday, Oct. 8, for a public holiday. Financial markets will resume trading on Wednesday, Oct. 9. The benchmark BSE index closed down 0.38% at 37,531.98 on Monday, while the broader NSE index ended 0.43% lower at 11,126.40. The 10-year benchmark bond yield IN072629G=CC closed at 6.68%, while the rupee INR=D4 settled at 71.02 to the dollar. (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)

ADVISORY-India markets closed on Tuesday for holiday
